tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_management_invoices (
    invoice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    invoice_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    payment_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_management_invoices (
    invoice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    invoice_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES waste_management_customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteManagementInvoices (
    invoice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    invoice_date DATE,
    customer_id INT,
    service_id INT,
    invoice_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES WasteManagementCustomers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES WasteManagementServices(service_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_management_services (
    invoice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    billing_address VARCHAR(255),
    service_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE billing_history (
    invoice_id INT,
    payment_date DATE,
    amount_paid DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_method VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (invoice_id, payment_date)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE invoices (
  invoice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  service_id INT,
  date TIMESTAMP,
  amount DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES services(service_id)
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  invoice_id INT,
  payment_date TIMESTAMP,
  amount DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (invoice_id) REFERENCES invoices(invoice_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  position TEXT,
  email TEXT
);
